post.body: Doctor Doom. Being very, very clever. (he IS a villain though)
spent the last minute saying bulb and laughing. In an open plan office. go me.
If the oportunity arises, it is YOUR DUTY to do it. twitpic would be nice too.
Thats when you tweet while having a threesome. Whoever can prove they have done that is a twitter GOD.
I'm liking that one.
Also Forbidden Planet and its interesting aroma.
Uhhh...not exactly flattering!
http://www.rinkworks.com/words/collective.shtml has a rather wonderful list.
Where are you Shiny guys moving BTW?
We'd all like to be in bed. Not together though. Although, with a big enough bed....
My Totoro is at the top of my christmas tree. Seems more proper than an angel or a star.
Now freaked out that your profile has a totoro on it. Did not know that before the Miyazaki reference. <keanu>woooohh</keanu>
That is actually lovely. Although I'm now thinking of Princess Mononoke. That was a wave of hogs though...
Because then they wouldn't have been new. They would be pre - new.
Nice. Great cocktail bar nearby. Good Martinis.
There are several apparantly, clutter, pounce, cloder and glaring. Amazing http://www.rinkworks.com/words/collective.shtml
surely there must be a word to describe a bunch of cats - like a murder of crows etc...
Do cats come in herds?
There is a picture. No one is seeing it though. Extensive soft tissue damage is what the nice nurse said.
Very very bad. FYI - drinking at Soho House and escalators don't mix.
Ahhh Gilmore Girls, like a big TV hug.
Yup! But at least the sky will be pretty!
Was good. Although I'm finding this series less funner than previous ones.
What would be the collective name for a bunch of twitterers? A tweet of twitterers sounds rubbish. Thoughts people?
Can anyone recommend a good bar around Shoreditch?
Thats it. I'm going home. A merry Christmas from Electric Spectre towers. Eat some pie. Drink some booze.

The Siphonophore is not one, but many individual jellyfish type creatures .. http://is.gd/d2hm

Death From Above!:
Everyone likes balloons right? They are the ideal method for deafening small children .. http://is.gd/cVtu
Morning all. I feel like i've been beaten up.
So. The electric spectre Xmas party Heroic quantities of booze, soho house, falling down an escalator & hospital. Win.
Just booked tickets to see Bruce Campbell. GROOVY.
I am going christmas shopping. God help me.

Who Wants A Space Shuttle?: NASA are giving away Space Shuttles. I want one. I want to give it a redneck paint .. http://is.gd/coiG
Artificial Brain Being Built: Somebody in America hasn’t watched enough science fiction, as this can only.. http://is.gd/coiD
'less funner' Jeeez. I need to read before updating.
And now I kinda want to finish the pizza. I am evidently AN IDIOT.
I have eaten far too much pizza. This is what happens without supervision. Thank fuck I live with someone.
Also. Hello twitter people. I have a hangover.
